tutorial.speak:
Today, I'll show you how to integrate Lessons.Church seamlessly within FreeShow to make your ministry presentations even more impactful.
Go to Lessons.Church to browse free curriculum options.
Select the lesson you'd like to import into FreeShow.
Click the Share icon on that lesson
Export to OLF
Click Download
Open FreeShow and choose File then import
Choose the Lessons.church type for file to import
Open The O L F file you just downloaded from Lessons.church
Wait for the files to download.
The lesson from Lessons.church has been successfully imported into FreeShow.
